verses.verse: And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to them to <S%H6942>hallow<s%> them, to minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest's<s%> office: <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%>

And <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H1101>tempered<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil:<s%> of <S%H2406>wheaten<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> them.

And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>into<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5536>basket,<s%> and <S%H7126>bring<s%> them in the <S%H5536>basket,<s%> with the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3801>coat,<s%> and the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and the <S%H2833>breastplate,<s%> and <S%H640>gird<s%> him with the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod:<s%>
And you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4701>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%> on the <S%H4701>turban.<s%>
Then shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him.
And you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> on them.

And you shall <S%H2296>gird<s%> them with <S%H73>girdles,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H2280>put<s%> the <S%H4021>bonnets<s%> on them: and the <S%H3550>priest's<s%> office shall be <S%H1992>theirs<s%> for a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute:<s%> and you shall <S%H3027>consecrate<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And you shall cause a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> to be <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>put<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock.<s%>
And you shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> with your <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H8210>pour<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>beside<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> that is <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

But the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and his <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and his <S%H6569>dung,<s%> shall you <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> it is a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

You shall also <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>put<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>
And you shall <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> it <S%H5439>round<s%> about on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5408>cut<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> in <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%> of him, and his <S%H3767>legs,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them to his <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and to his <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H854>whole<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it is a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell,<s%> an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H352>ram;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>put<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>

Then shall you <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> of his <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the right <S%H241>ear<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it on <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and on his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and on the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him: and he shall be <S%H6942>hallowed,<s%> and his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> with him.

Also you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H451>rump,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, and the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder;<s%> for it is a <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration:<s%>

And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> of <S%H8081>oiled<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7550>wafer<s%> out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of the <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread that is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> in the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and in the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> them of their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it is an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> and <S%H5130>wave<s%> it for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and it shall be your <S%H4490>part.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of the <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering, and the <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> of the <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5130>waved,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7311>heaved<s%> up, of the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> even of that <S%H834>which<s%> is for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and of that <S%H834>which<s%> is for his <S%H1121>sons:<s%>

And it shall be <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> by a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for it is an <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering:<s%> and it shall be an <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of their <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings, even their <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, to be <S%H4888>anointed<s%> therein, and to be <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H3027><s%> in them.

And that <S%H1121>son<s%> that is <S%H3548>priest<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead<s%> shall <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.
And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> and <S%H1310>seethe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> that is in the basket <S%H5536><s%>by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> those things with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3722>atonement<s%> was made, to <S%H3027>consecrate<s%> and to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them: but a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof, <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> ought of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H4394>consecrations,<s%> or of the <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3498>remain<s%> to the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> then you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> it shall not be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it is <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

And thus shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> things <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall you <S%H3027>consecrate<s%> them.

And you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> every <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering for <S%H3725>atonement:<s%> and you shall <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> when you have made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for it, and you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> it, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it; and it shall be an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy:<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is that <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even:<s%>

And with the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> a <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deal of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7253>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil;<s%> and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering.

And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> thereto according to the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and according to the <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering thereof, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell,<s%> an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

This shall be a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> you, to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to you.
And <S%H8033>there<s%> I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the tabernacle shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> by my <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And I will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> I will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> also both <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> to minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest's<s%> office.
And I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> that <S%H3318>brought<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that I may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>
